page.title: 17RELIGION : SWANSEA WEST
page.content:
In our area, there are many churches, chapels and other places of worship. There are 7 Anglican churches(Church in Wales),2 Roman Catholic,2 Welsh Baptist,2 Seventh Day Adventist,2 Methodist and 1 Mormon church.Children attending schools in this area belong to many faiths or denominations : Hindu,Muslim,Jewish,Mormon,Roman Catholic,Exclusive Brethren,Anglican and Nonconformist. Children of the Jewish faith and members of the Exclusive Brethren do not attend school worship. Sometimes services are in the Welsh language.
In school assemblies there is usually a hymn,a reading and a prayer. Sometimes modern "pop" tunes are used for the hymns. At Christmas and Easter schools hold special services, sometimes in local churches/chapels.
